title.message: We use semantic-release, so your PR title needs to be prefixed with a type, e.g. `refactor: the title`. Use one of `build|ci|docs|feat|fix|perf|refactor|style|test|chore|revert` for type. See https://github.com/marionebl/commitlint/tree/master/%40commitlint/config-conventional for reference on which type to use.
